name: And Another Zombie Apocalypse
description:
Control your shooting timing, you can manually reload. In every mag there is 7 bullets. Survive as long as possible.

Controls:

W, Arrow Up - Up 

A,  Arrow  Left - Left 

S, Arrow  Down- Down 

D,  Arrow right - Right

Q, 1 - Reload Left

E, 2 - Reload right

Mouse Left Click - Left Shooting 

Mouse Right Click - Right Shooting 

Escape - Back to the main menu

P.S. I know about some bugs, but I noticed them after publishing it and already spend my 3 hours. You can still tell me if you find something.
